data.title: Stadia that held European Cup Finals
data.text:
This list includes only finals played over a single match leg.

N. Stadium City Country Competition 9 Feĳenoord-De Kuip Rotterdam Netherlands CWC 1963, CWC 1968, CC 1972, CWC 1974, CC 1982, CWC 1985, CWC 1991, CWC 1997, UC 2002 7 Wembley (1923) London England CC
